name: BH Engineers
overview:
BH Engineers came into inception as partnership firm in the beautiful city of Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India. Since the time of inception in 2011, we have been putting sincere efforts and successfully manufacturing and supplying a quality range of Conveyor Systems, Industrial Feeders, Conveyor Assembly, Bulk Material Handling Systems, Fabricated Structures and Stone Crushers.

Our Product Range: Roller Conveyors Redler Conveyors Portable Conveyors Chain Conveyors Industrial Feeders Conveyor Assembly Bulk Material Handling Systems Fabricated Structures Stone Crushers

Infrastructure: The infrastructure at BH Engineers is exemplary. We possess all the requisite amenities which are expected of an excellent manufacturing company, our manufacturing unit has latest technology and equipments, all other departments too are fully equipped with all the facilities that assist in manufacturing world class products.

Our Team: We have excellent people working in all the departments of BH Engineers right from manufacturing to dispatch. They show excellent professionalism in their work. People work like a team and with an attitude of not creating limits for themselves. We make people to know their potential and how to excel in doing their jobs.

Our Quality Assurance: When people look for quality conveyors, Industrial feeders, fabrication structures the first name that strikes their mind is that of BH Engineers.

Our Clients: We have been continually progressing due to our clients and their satisfaction is of utmost importance to us. Our all business activities and strategies are done keeping in view how these are going to affect the interest of our clients. We take product customization for the convenience of our clients, till date we have never refused any valid demand of our customers.
